originalText.text: I've been coming here for over 20 years. Dr Barrone is so thorough as are his team of radiologists and technicians. Kind, they will not rush you. He'll sit and review your scans until you feel comfortable. Special shout out to Yolanda and all the ladies at the front desk. They never drop the ball. Twenty years of follow through and kindness.  Ty.

originalText.text:
I have been seeing Dr Barone for 23 years. I have always been treated  with the highest competence,  from Dr. Barone, the radiologists,  and the administrative team.  They go out of their way to make sure you are comfortable  and confident  in their professionalism.
I would recommend their practice with full confidence.

text.text:
I have been seeing Dr Barone for 23 years. I have always been treated  with the highest competence,  from Dr. Barone, the radiologists,  and the administrative team.  They go out of their way to make sure you are comfortable  and confident  in their professionalism.
I would recommend their practice with full confidence.

originalText.text: Dr. Clement Barone is an extraordinarily gifted radiologist. He detected a minuscule pre-cancerous nodule in a rather obscure area behind my (dense) breast--I don't believe the mammography lab I used to go to would have found it. Because he found it so early, I didn't have to get a mastectomy. Not to mention that his mammography technician doesn't kill me the way they used to at Lennox Hill Mammography. Most recently he discovered uterine cancer and gave me very good information on how to proceed. Because he knew I'd had bad experiences with doctors during a previous cancer battle, he has called to check on me every week to make sure I'm being taken care of. I am enormously grateful to Dr. Barone and his wonderful staff for their kind and expert care.

originalText.text: Dr. Barone was nice enough for the two minutes I met him, and the technician was nice too, but the admin staff - both billing and front desk - are incredibly unprofessional. I had to contest a bill with them through my insurance company for a preventative appointment that they coded incorrectly - my insurance company ruled in my favor, but the woman I had to work with through the billing department was rude to the degree that it bordered on harassment. I only went here on referral from another doctor but would never return, sorry to say.

originalText.text: Ive been going to Dr. Barone for years and I cannot recommend anyone else but his team for mammograms. The team and Dr. Barone create a safe environment where I always feel comfortable and well taken care.
